post.text: Join Hillary on the trail in North Carolina with Bernie Sanders and Pharrell Williams. hillaryclinton.com/makeaplan

comment.author: John
comment.text: Bernie Sanders! You broke our hearts! Hillary is the billionaire class! Look what you're doing! You are supporting the corruption in Washington DC! You stood for us, now you stand for them!

replies.author: Molly
replies.text: And he will be working for her too if she's. Elected!
